name: Home
caption: The home page is the first screen the player sees, and contains the instructions for the game.

name: Overview
caption: Once the blue button is clicked, the Google Map API is called, and a marker (the Hat) is dropped on the player's current location.  The map will re-center on the player every few seconds.

name: Battle
caption: The pikachu hiding in grass mark the location of a pokemon, and once clicked, a random pokemon is selected from the list available from that location.

name: Throw
caption: The player then has the option to either [Catch] the pokemon by throwing a pokeball, or [Run] from the battle.

name: Caught
caption: It may take a few throws, but eventually the pokemon will either be caught, or it will run away.

name: Pokedex
caption: As you see and catch pokemon, you will fill the Pokedex.

name: Pokemon
caption: Catching a pokemon will let you see more of its stats on its 'Dex page, than if you only have seen it.

name: Homepage
caption: The instructions for each game can be found on the home page.

name: Game page
caption: There are three card games available, War, Memory, and Koikoi.

name: Cards
caption: Not many people are familiar with hanafuda cards, so every card, and their name can be found here.

name: Point combos
caption: Koikoi has a relatively complicated set of rules, so all of the point winning card combos are detailed on this page.
